text: Anata wa taeshino be. (Katsute) shito-tachi ga, fukutsu no ketsui o shita yo ni taeshinobe. Kare-ra (fushinjin no mono) no tame ni isoide wa naranai. Kare-ra ni yakusoku sa reta koto (chobatsu) o miru hi, marude (shi kara fukkatsu made no kikan o) tsuitachi no naka no hon'no ichi-ji shika sugoshite wa inakatta ka no yo ni (omoudearou). (Kore wa arra kara no) o tasshidearu. Horobosa reru no wa,(arra no) okite ni somuku-sha-tachi dakedearu (to iu koto o)
